meanings.definition: To give a new name to something.
meanings.sent1: She renamed her cat Fluffy to Snowball.
meanings.sent2: The company renamed its product to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: After much thought, she renamed her plant 'Larry the Leaf'.
meanings.sent4: The town was renamed 'Sunshine Valley' after the big festival.
meanings.sent5: The teacher renamed the game 'Math Madness' to 'Number Ninja'.

meanings.sent1: He renamed the file yesterday for better organization.
meanings.sent2: The street was renamed in honor of the famous author.
meanings.sent3: The cat renamed itself 'King of the House' after catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The old building was renamed 'The Historic Tower' by the locals.
meanings.sent5: The chef renamed the dish 'Spicy Surprise' after adding extra chili.
